The cost proposal organization, based in Hamburg, Germany, are looking for a Site Layout Engineer. The cost proposal team is responsible for providing technical sales support for projects in the acquisition phase - from the first tender to the signing of the project. The site layout team is responsible for developing the general and project specific requirements and related documentation for civil works and site conditions (roads, crane hard stands, etc.) related to the construction phase of the project. How to contribute to our vision Your primary role is to act as the technical advisor to the cost proposal managers to capture all relevant costs associated with the execution phase of a project. Technical support and teamwork with the sales department and directly with clients to optimize installation and costs are vital facets of the role. You will also… Define general and project specific installation and delivery strategies for the project execution phase. Define, produce and update the general and project specific standards and requirements for civil works / site conditions based on up-to-date industry EHS and technical standards. Perform site visits to identify the best transport and installation strategies considering the needs of the client and optimized costing. Participate in customer meetings/negotiations in cooperation with the cost proposal managers and sales team. Support the involved departments/stakeholders throughout the sales phase of a project with focus on site conditions, transportation, safety and technical feasibility. Support in new product development when necessary with a focus on technical feasibility. What you need to make a difference Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change.
